name: A Town Called Happenstance
description:
Help renowned Detective Carter Montague solved his biggest case yet! Well, in the full game, I mean. This here is just the demo.
Here you can get a feel for how the gameplay works, how the 3D camera works, and, if you're lucky, find a really big sandwich.

Please note that everything here is work in progress.
All text and voices are in English, with a monochrome filter available for those who may need or prefer it.
Update July 2nd
- Changed the way to open the inventory.
- Retro mode removed.
- Volume Controls fixed.
- Various bug fixes.
- Demo now exits to Windows after completion.
